DOC.brief_summary: This study wish to show if the preoperative level of pain, function or activity for hip and knee arthroplasty patients has any predictive value of the time it takes to fulfill the well-defined discharge criteria.
DOC.brief_title: Preoperative Pain, Function, and Activity for Total Hip and Knee Arthroplasty Patients
DOC.detailed_description: The investigators would like to be able to identify those patients, for whom it will take longest time to fulfill the discharge criteria. With this knowledge the investigators will be able to initiate sufficient treatment already before operation.
DOC.criteria: Total hip arthroplasty patients Total knee arthroplasty patients Inability to speak and understand Danish Inability to perform the functional measurements due to other conditions
DOC.keyword: Muscle strength, functional performance, joint replacement
